ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed tomato soup, undiluted
1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed vegetable beef soup, undiluted
instructions: In a large saucepan over medium heat, brown beef; drain.
Add the remaining ingredients and mix well.
Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 8-10 minutes or until heated through.
title: Campfire Stew
steps: In a large saucepan over medium heat, brown beef; drain. Add the remaining ingredients and mix well. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 8-10 minutes or until heated through.
